actions: Strengthens the Spleen, resolves Dampness, clears Heat, expels pus and clears Damp-Heat.
With Dong Gua Zi, for scanty urine and edema due Damp Obstruction.
With Dong Gua Zi and Tao Ren, for Lung abscess.
Clears Heat, expels Phlegm, expels pus, moistens the Lungs and drains Dampness.
With Da Huang and Mu Dan Pi, for Intestinal abscess.
With Yi Yi Ren, for Lung or Large Intestinal abscess that has formed pus.
Purges accumulations, guides out Stagnation, softens hardness, moistens Dryness, clears Heat, drains Fire and reduces swelling.
With Da Huang, for constipation due to Heat in the Stomach and Intestines.
With Da Huang and Gan Cao, for moderate constipation due to accumulation of Excess Heat.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, drains pus and reduces swelling.
With Da Huang, Dong Gua Zi and Tao Ren, for abdominal pain, constipation, and low grade fever associated with unsuppurated abdominal abscess.
Breaks up Blood Stasis , invigorates Blood circulation, moistens the Intestines, unblocks the bowels and drains abscesses.
With Da Huang, for severe abdominal infection.
Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
Drains Heat, purges accumulations, drains Fire, transforms Dampness, promotes urination,invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and reduces Fire toxicity.
With Mu Dan Pi, Tao Ren and Mang Xiao, for Intestinal abscess.
With Mang Xiao, for abscess, swellings and toxic sores.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Disperses Blood Stagnation
Activates the Blood
Removes suppuration
Clears Damp-Heat
syndromes: Damp-Heat with Blood Stagnation in the Lower Jiao
Heat and Blood Stasis in the genital area

symptoms: Tenderness and soreness of the lower abdomen
A right-sided abdominal swelling that is soft when touched and not very painful
manifestations.tongueCoat: Dry and yellow or dry and maroon to the root
manifestations.pulse: Rapid or Rapid, empty and weak or Rapid and overflowing
